s0151: Invaded Song Huang Chi, Song again took it.
s0152: Seventeenth year, with Qin battled Yuan Li, Qin took our Shao Liang.
s0155: Zhao requested aid from Qi, Qi made Tian Ji, Sun Bin save Zhao, defeated Wei Gui Ling.
s0156: Nineteenth year, feudal lords surrounded our Xiang Ling.
s0157: Built long wall, blocked Gu Yang.
s0158: Twentieth year, returned Zhao Han Dan, allied at Zhang Shui above.
s0159: Twenty-first year, with Qin assembled Tong.
s0161: Twenty-eighth year, Qi Wei Wang died.
s0162: Zhong Shan jun became chancellor of Wei.
s0163: Thirtieth year, Wei attacked Zhao, Zhao urgently told Qi.
s0164: Qi Xuan Wang used Sun Zi plan, saved Zhao attacked Wei.
s0165: Wei then greatly raised troops, made Pang Juan general, ordered Tai Zi Shen as upper general.
s0166: Passed Wai Huang, Wai Huang Xu Zi told Tai Zi said: 'Subject has hundred battle hundred victory technique.'
s0169: Said: 'Tai Zi self lead attack Qi, great victory unite Ju, then rich not over have Wei, noble not increase be wang.
s0170: If battle not victory Qi, then ten thousand generations without Wei.
s0171: This subject hundred battle hundred victory technique.'
s0172: Tai Zi said: 'Yes, please must follow gong words then return.'
s0173: Guest said: 'Tai Zi though wish return, cannot.
s0174: They urge Tai Zi battle attack, wish drink soup many.
s0175: Tai Zi though wish return, fear cannot.'
s0176: Tai Zi because wished return, his charioteer said: 'General leave then return, with north same.'
s0177: Tai Zi indeed with Qi people battled, defeated at Ma Ling.
s0178: Qi captured Wei Tai Zi Shen, killed general Juan, army then greatly broken.
s0179: Thirty-first year, Qin, Zhao, Qi together attacked us, Qin general Shang Jun deceived our general Gong Zi Ang then surprise seized his army, broke it.
s0180: Qin used Shang Jun, east land to river, and Qi, Zhao several broke us, An Yi near Qin, thereupon moved governed Da Liang.
s0181: Made Gong Zi He as Tai Zi.
s0182: Thirty-third year, Qin Xiao Gong died, Shang Jun fled Qin returned Wei, Wei angered, not entered.
s0183: Thirty-fifth year, with Qi Xuan Wang assembled Ping A south.
s0184: Hui Wang several defeated in military campaigns, lowly ritual thick gifts to recruit worthy people.
s0185: Zou Yan, Chun Yu Kun, Meng Ke all arrived Liang.
s0186: Liang Hui Wang said: 'I not worthy, troops three broken outside, Tai Zi captured, upper general died, state with empty, shame first jun ancestral temple she ji, I very ashamed it, old not far thousand li, disgrace fortunately arrived ruined yi court, will what benefit our state?'
s0187: Meng Ke said: 'Jun cannot speak profit like this.
s0188: Jun wish profit then da fu wish profit, da fu wish profit then common people wish profit, high low contend profit, state then dangerous.
s0189: Be person jun, benevolence righteousness only, what with profit!'
s0191: Thirty-sixth year, again with Qi wang assembled Zhen.
s0192: This year, Hui Wang died, son Xiang Wang established.
s0193: Xiang Wang first year, with feudal lords assembled Xu Zhou, mutually wang.
s0194: Pursued honored father Hui Wang as wang.
s0195: Fifth year, Qin defeated our Long Jia army forty-five thousand at Diao Yin, surrounded our Jiao, Qu Wo.
s0197: Sixth year, with Qin assembled Ying.
s0198: Qin took our Fen Yin, Pi Shi, Jiao.
s0199: Wei attacked Chu, defeated them at Xing Shan.
s0200: Seventh year, Wei completely entered Shang Jun to Qin.
